segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching as high as he can, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement on his face as he reaches into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him intently, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's hoping he'll share some cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it amusing how focused she is on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children planned this cookie heist while the woman was distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a little adventure for them, right in their own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievous little faces.
segments.speaker: PAR
